text: Learning about Ryan Davis' death really bummed me out during the whole day. For those who don't know him, he was the co-founder of GiantBomb, a great/friendly video game website that has actual personality. He got married last week and I'm glad he did before his sudden passing. RIP.
author: SupraDarky
